user.description: Username displayed above the review description, at the right of the icon

description.description: Review description displayed below the review username, at the top of the rate

url.description: Review external url. If set, an icon will be showed at the top right of the review

logo.description: Social icon type, showed at the top right of the container. Supports popular web services like Facebook, Twitter, Google and so on. Proviced icon list will grow up time by time and will be updated with the latest web services, to keep it usable for the future.

max.description: max vote (max number of icons displayed) - extended from [Rater component](../../atoms/Rater/props.md#max)
max.comment: max vote (max number of icons displayed) - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/atoms/Rater Rater}

vertical.description: if `true`, rate icons will be showed vertically - extended from [Rater component](../../atoms/Rater/props.md#vertical)
vertical.comment: if `true`, rate icons will be showed vertically - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/atoms/Rater Rater}

rateType.comment: vote icons type - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/atoms/Rater Rater}
